languages.text: "Дом Зауэрбэк, которому вы поручили организацию торжеств, желает вам благоволения Императора в этот торжественный день".

traits.locale_text: "Дом Зауэрбэк, которому вы поручили организацию торжеств, желает вам благоволения Императора в этот торжественный день".

languages.text: "House Sauerback, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, wishes that the Emperor's favour be with you on this momentous day."
languages.original_text: "Дом Зауэрбэк, которому вы поручили организацию торжеств, желает вам благоволения Императора в этот торжественный день".

traits.locale_text: "House Sauerback, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, wishes for the Emperor's favor to be with you on this momentous day."
"House Sauerback, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, wishes for the Emperor's favor to be with you on this momentous day."
"House Sauerback, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, wishes that the Emperor's favour be with you on this momentous day."
"House Sauerback, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, wishes that the Emperor's favour be with you on this momentous day."
"House Sauerback, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, wishes that the Emperor's favour be with you on this momentous day."

languages.text: 「ザウアーバック家は陛下より祝祭の手配を承っております。この記念すべき日に、皇帝の愛が陛下と共にあらんことを」
languages.original_text: "House Sauerback, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, wishes that the Emperor's favour be with you on this momentous day."

traits.locale_text: 「ザウアーバック家は陛下より祝祭の手配を承っております。この記念すべき日に、皇帝の愛が陛下と共にあらんことを」

languages.text: “您已授权让苏尔贝克家族负责本次庆典。苏尔贝克家族衷心祝愿在这个庄严的日子里，神皇的恩典与您同在。”
languages.original_text: "House Sauerback, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, wishes that the Emperor's favour be with you on this momentous day."

traits.locale_text: “您已授权让苏尔贝克家族负责本次庆典。苏尔贝克家族衷心祝愿在这个庄严的日子里，神皇的恩典与您同在。”

languages.text: «La casa Sauerback, a cuyos miembros ha puesto al frente de la organización de los festejos, desea que el favor del Emperador le acompañe en esta ocasión tan señalada».
languages.original_text: "House Sauerback, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, wishes that the Emperor's favour be with you on this momentous day."

traits.locale_text: «La casa Sauerback, a cuyos miembros ha puesto al frente de la organización de los festejos, desea que el favor del Emperador le acompañe en esta ocasión tan señalada».

languages.text: « La maison Sauerback, que vous avez chargée d'organiser les festivités, vous souhaite que l'Empereur soit avec vous en ce jour béni. »
languages.original_text: "House Sauerback, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, wishes that the Emperor's favour be with you on this momentous day."

traits.locale_text: « La maison Sauerback, que vous avez chargée d'organiser les festivités, vous souhaite que l'Empereur soit avec vous en ce jour béni. »

languages.text: "Das Haus Sauerback, dem Ihr das Arrangement der Festlichkeiten übertragen habt, hofft, dass Ihr an diesem wichtigen Tag in der Gunst des Imperators steht."
languages.original_text: "House Sauerback, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, wishes that the Emperor's favour be with you on this momentous day."

traits.locale_text: "Das Haus Sauerback, dem Ihr das Arrangement der Festlichkeiten übertragen habt, hofft, dass Ihr an diesem wichtigen Tag in der Gunst des Imperators steht."

languages.text: "Şenlik tertibi ile tevdi ettiğiniz Sauerback Hanesi, bu önemli günde İmparator'un lütfunun sizinle olmasını diliyor."
languages.original_text: "House Sauerback, to whom you entrusted the arrangements for the festivities, wishes that the Emperor's favour be with you on this momentous day."

traits.locale_text: "Şenlik tertibi ile tevdi ettiğiniz Sauerback Hanesi, bu önemli günde İmparator'un lütfunun sizinle olmasını diliyor."
